title.narrative: MADA (The Palestinian Center for Development and Media Freedoms ) - Palestinian's right to Access information

description.narrative: Freedom of Information (FOI) can be defined as the right to access information held by public bodies. Freedom of information / access to information are parts of the fundamental right of freedom of expression. (Resolution 59 of the UN General Assembly adop ted in 1946; Article 19 of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights (1948).) Fulfilling the right to access information requires among other things effective mechanisms through which the public can get information and find out what governments do on their behalf and that this information is disseminated and distributed by the public institutions. The right of access to information is linked to many concepts and values like good governance and transparency in addition to its association with other human rig hts such as the right to freedom of opinion and expression freedom of the press freedom of assembly the right to political participation and the right to live in a clean environment. MADA has worked for many years in the field trying to ensure the enactmen t of the access to information law and to raise citizen's awareness about the importance of the law and its benefits. It is with his background that MADA designed this action ?Palestinian's right to Access information? for 2015/2016 to achieve the followin g objectives:?To engage Palestinian journalists to promote right to access information and accountability in Palestine: To inform Palestinian journalists on their right to get access to information and the importance of having an access to information law in Palestine to engage Palestinian journalists to work with MADA on promoting the right to access to information law and pressure for its performing in Palestine. ?To enhance Palestinian citizens ability to access information:To conduct a multi angle campa ign on the draft access to information law that was handed to the Palestinian government. Capacity building of MADA center to provide and disseminate all information pertaining to its own work and to inform Palestinian Public Relations officers working for government institutions on the right to access information and the importance of having an access to information law in Palestine.
